selection_type.label: Selection Type
selection_type.directories_tooltip: Select a directory → Parallel conversion (preserves directory structure)
selection_type.files_tooltip: Select files → Batch convert to output directory
selection_type.tree_tooltip: Select a directory → Choose files to convert → Parallel conversion (preserves directory structure)

css_preset.list_tooltip: You can choose a CSS preset.

import_language.tooltip: Import any language from JSON file. (Automatically reloads for validation.)
import_language.tooltip_invalid_json: Note: For invalid JSON, fallback to English. (See Wiki for JSON format.)

log_level.tooltip_summary: Lower log levels include higher severity levels. (e.g. Error ⊂ Info)
log_level.tooltip_debug: Debug: Logs data during conversion process.

log.open_file_tooltip: Open current log file. (Creates new log file on each launch.)

patch.autoDetectSkyrimData_tooltip: Automatically detects the Data directory of the Steam version of Skyrim according to the output target.
patch.autoDetectSkyrimData_error_massage: The Skyrim Data directory could not be detected automatically. Please specify the path manually as the registry does not exist.
patch.input_directory: Data directory(Can Glob: e.g. `D:\GAME\ModOrganizer Skyrim SE\mods\*`)
patch.auto_remove_meshes_option_label: Automatic deletion of the destination `meshes` & `.d_merge/.debug` directory
patch.auto_remove_meshes_option_help: Remove each time just before a patch to avoid unintended reflection of the previous hkx.
patch.use_progress_reporter_option_help: Displays progress status. (+ about 2 seconds delay or more)

hack_options.cast_ragdoll_event_help: Corrects common field naming mistakes in patches (e.g. substituting 'event' with 'contactEvent', 'anotherBoneIndex' with 'bones'). Allows parsing of invalid data but may hide real errors.

debug_options.output_patch_json_help: Outputs prioritized patch data for each hkx in JSON format. The patch files are saved to `<output>/.d_merge/.debug/patches/`.
debug_options.output_merged_json_help: Outputs the data before variable(e.g.$variableID[ID]$) substitution and right before HKX conversion in JSON format. The file is saved to `<output>/.d_merge/.debug/meshes/`.
debug_options.output_merged_xml_help: Outputs the data before variable substitution and right before HKX conversion in XML format. The file is saved to `<output>/.d_merge/.debug/meshes/`.

patch.output_target_help: Select the target game version for the output hkx.

toolbar.locked_due_to_sorting_help: Editing is disabled during sorting. Click to unlock.
